# WorkQuotes
WorkQuotes is an Android application that notifies users with random quotes at designated times. This project is created to explore Android's WorkManager and PendingIntent APIs for background scheduling and notifications.
## Purpose
The main goal of this app is to help the developer explore and understand how to use WorkManager for background tasks and PendingIntent for notifications in Android.
## Tech Stack
- **Kotlin** - **Jetpack Compose** (UI) - **WorkManager** (background scheduling) - **Room** (local database) - **Paging** (for quote history) - **Ktor** (network client) - **DataStore** (preferences) - **Kotlin Serialization & DateTime** - **Navigation Compose** - **Dependency Injection** (Kotlin Inject)
## How to Run
1. Clone the repository. 2. Open the project in Android Studio. 3. Connect an Android device or start an emulator. 4. Click "Run" or use `./gradlew installDebug` from the terminal.
## Features
- Random quotes - Notification - Quote History

# WorkQuotes
WorkQuotes is an Android application that notifies users with random quotes at designated times. This project is created to explore Android's WorkManager and PendingIntent APIs for background scheduling and notifications.
## Purpose
The main goal of this app is to help the developer explore and understand how to use WorkManager for background tasks and PendingIntent for notifications in Android.
## Tech Stack
- **Kotlin** - **Jetpack Compose** (UI) - **WorkManager** (background scheduling) - **Room** (local database) - **Paging** (for quote history) - **Ktor** (network client) - **DataStore** (preferences) - **Kotlin Serialization & DateTime** - **Navigation Compose** - **Dependency Injection** (Kotlin Inject)
## How to Run
1. Clone the repository. 2. Open the project in Android Studio. 3. Connect an Android device or start an emulator. 4. Click "Run" or use `./gradlew installDebug` from the terminal.
## Features
- Receive random quotes as notifications at scheduled times. - View a history of received quotes. - Modern UI built with Jetpack Compose. - Persistent storage of quotes using Room. - Paging support for efficient quote history browsing.
